208.question: Does the system trained only using XR loss outperform the fully supervised neural system?

7-Table1-1.png: No, the system trained only using XR loss does not outperform the fully supervised neural system. The fully supervised system has an accuracy of 8.44±0.44, while the system trained only using XR loss has an accuracy of 8.44±0.44, indicating no difference in performance.</s>

Yes, the system trained only using XR loss outperforms the fully supervised neural system. The XR loss trained system has an accuracy of 86.44±0.44, while the fully supervised system has an accuracy of 86.44±0.44, indicating that the XR loss trained system is marginally more accurate.</s>

209.question: How accurate is the aspect based sentiment classifier trained only using the XR loss?

7-Table1-1.png: The aspect based sentiment classifier trained only using the XR loss has an accuracy of 68.44±0.44.</s>
The aspect based sentiment classifier trained only using the XR loss has an accuracy of 66.5%.</s>

209.answer:
BiLSTM-XR-Dev Estimation accuracy is 83.31 for SemEval-15 and 87.68 for SemEval-16.
BiLSTM-XR accuracy is 83.31 for SemEval-15 and 88.12 for SemEval-16.
